mapper.select: SELECT j.postNo, j.title, c.comname, j.location, j.status, j.deadline FROM jobPosting j JOIN company c ON j.comNo=c.comNo ORDER BY j.postNo DESC;

SELECT jp.postNo, c.comName, jp.usersId, jp.managerName, jp.postExperience, jp.workType, jp.postGradu, jp.title, jp.postDescription, jp.postTechStack, jp.location, jp.postSalary, jp.regdate, jp.deadline, jp.status FROM JobPosting jp JOIN Company c ON jp.comNo = c.comNo WHERE jp.postNo = #{postNo}
SELECT a.postno, j.title, c.comName, j.location, j.status, j.deadline FROM applicant a JOIN jobPosting j ON a.postno = j.postno JOIN company c ON c.comno = j.comno WHERE a.userno = #{userNo};

SELECT jp.postNo, jp.title, c.comName, jp.location, jp.`status`, jp.deadline FROM users u JOIN jobPosting jp ON u.usersid = jp.usersid join company c on jp.comNo = c.comNo where u.usersid = #{usersId};

SELECT jp.postNo, jp.title, c.comName, jp.location, jp.`status`, jp.deadline FROM users u JOIN jobPosting jp ON u.usersid = jp.usersid join company c on jp.comNo = c.comNo where u.usersid = #{usersId} and jp.postNo = #{postNo};

mapper.update: UPDATE jobPosting SET comNo = #{comNo}, managerName = #{managerName}, usersId = #{usersId}, postExperience = #{postExperience}, workType = #{workType}, postGradu = #{postGradu}, title = #{title}, postDescription = #{postDescription}, postTechStack = #{postTechStack}, location = #{location}, postSalary = #{postSalary}, regDate = #{regdate}, deadline = #{deadline}, status = #{status} WHERE postNo = #{postNo}
